name: Vzaar Media Management
author: Enamul

sections.description:
Vzaar Media Management is a full integrated media plugin for WordPress. Using this plugin one can Add/Edit/Delete media (video & audio) to vzaar and embed the media (video & audio) to any post or page.

Important Links: ”

Features

  1. Vzaar API configuration

  2. Add/Edit/Delete Media (video & audio) to vzaar

  3. List the uploaded media to your wp control panel

  4. Embed media (video & audio) to your post.

  5. Control the player dimension, autoplay, color, border, …etc.

Credits

sections.installation:
1. Upload the files to wp-content/plugins/vzaar-media-management

  2. Activate the plugin

  3. Click on “VZAAR MEDIA” or “Settings” and set your VZAAR API Key

  4. Click on “Add Media” and upload some media

  5. Go to your post/page an click “Add Video” Flash media icon (at the top of the editor). Then there you will get the Tab “Vzaar Media”.
sections.faq:
When writing a page/post, you can use the following shortcode:

Simple Use : [vzaarmedia vid=”830323″]

Customised Use : [vzaarmedia vid=”830323″ height=”186″ width=”258″ color=”brown”]
sections.changelog:
V1.2 – 06.02.2012

  • Bugfix : Made compatible with Vzaar API settings.

V1.1 – 05.02.2012

  • Bugfix : There were some warning messages when wp debug mode is set to true. Those are fixed.
